title: Action figures for 'Django Unchained'
teaser: Quentin Tarantino's new film has some possibly controversial merchandise.
contentencoded:
This final note today. An item that kinda makes you shake your head a bit.

Quentin Tarantino, as you might know, has a new movie out: "Django Unchained," about slavery and rebellion and revenge. Not a theme that you'd think would easily lend itself to gimmicky marketing tactics.

Or would it? You can now buy -- should you so choose -- poseable eight-inch action figures of the main characters. Slaves, masters, the whole thing.
